headline: Poor place to work
pros: No real work here. People come here to retire. This is an employer of last resort.
cons:
Poor management 
No leadership
No growth
Poor pension plan
Below avg medical insurance

headline: Web developer
pros: friendly coworkers, steady stream of work, not stressful, salary competitive with private sector
cons: No work from home option for I.T titles (except during Covid)

headline: Runaway!!!
pros:
Lot of free time
Okay medical insurance
cons:
No career advancement
Racist peers
Poor Management 
People play candy crush all day long
Openly talk about women in derogatory manner
Openly use racial slurs at each other at work
Very poor/toxic culture

headline: editor
pros: it is a student association and great for networking and building experience while at school.
cons: all the students were committed and worked well together.no complaints.

headline: Qa analyst
pros: Very good company to do consulting or work full time
cons: Commute is bit long if you stay in Nj

headline: DR Manager
pros: Permanent positions you can retire on if you perform well.
cons: Very poor Management to the top executives.

headline: Consultant
pros: Great people and team. Work and life balance.
cons: Not able to adopt newer technologies

headline: FISA is not a good employer !!!
pros: Good commute location in New York City
cons: Very bad management in all level.
